scripts.buildm: npm run static && webpack --devtool source-map src/model-first/app.js dist/model-first/bundle.js
scripts.m: watch 'npm run static' src & npm run buildm -- -w & npm run livem
scripts.buildc1: npm run static && webpack --devtool source-map src/component-first/app1.js dist/component-first/bundle.js
scripts.buildc2: npm run static && webpack --devtool source-map src/component-first/app2.js dist/component-first/bundle2.js
scripts.c1: watch 'npm run static' src & npm run buildc1 -- -w & npm run livec -- --entry-file=index1.html
scripts.c2: watch 'npm run static' src & npm run buildc2 -- -w & npm run livec -- --entry-file=index2.html
